title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:action_on_hit'
- Executes a Bi-entity Action Type when the entity that has the power has hit another entity.

bientity_action.description: The action to be executed on either or both 'actor' (the entity that has the power) and 'target' (the entity/entities that's been hit) entities.

damage_condition.description: If specified, the action will only execute when this condition holds for the damage that was dealt by the 'actor' (the entity that has the power) entity.

cooldown.description: Interval of ticks this power needs to recharge before the power can be triggered again.

hud_render.description: Determines how the cooldown of this power is visualized on the HUD.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the action will only execute when this condition is fulfilled by either or both 'actor' (the entity that has the power) and 'target' (the entity/entities that's been hit) entities.
